original: Lindahl, August Rikard Anslielm, fil. dr, Göteborg, f. 21/4/97 i Själevad, Västern. 1., av August o. Kristina L. G. 25 m. Anna Österlind. Barn: Marit f. 27, Anders 29, Torsten 31. — Folkskolläriex. 18, stud :ex. 21, fil. lic. 42 samt fil. dr 46, allt i Gbg. Folk-skollär. i Gbg fr. 20, förest, f. Aug. Abraliamsons Stift., Nääs, 44-46, docent o. tf. professor 46-47, red. f. Folk-skolan-Sv. Lärartidn. sed. 47. Stud:-resa t. Frankr. 38. Skr.: Årsbok fr. Nääs (45), Inlärningsprocessen (47) samt ett flertal smärre skr. o. art. i fackpressen.
translated: Lindahl, August Rikard Anslielm, Ph.D., Gothenburg, b. 21/4/97 in Själevad, Västernorrland. 1st child of August and Kristina L. G. Married Anna Österlind in 1925. Children: Marit b. 1927, Anders b. 1929, Torsten b. 1931. Completed primary school teacher exam in 1918, completed university studies in 1921, obtained licentiate degree in 1942, and Ph.D. in 1946, all in Gothenburg. Worked as a primary school teacher in Gothenburg since 1920, became director of Aug. Abrahamsson Foundation in Nääs from 1944-1946, appointed associate professor and acting professor from 1946-1947, and editor of "Folk-skolan-Sv. Lärartidn." since 1947. Went on a study trip to France in 1938. Published "Årsbok fr. Nääs" in 1945, "Inlärningsprocessen" in 1947, and several smaller writings and articles in professional journals.
